profile_positions.description: PhD project at the cardiology-electrophysiology department focussing on atrial fibrillation
profile_positions.title: Technical Physician / PhD candidate

profile_positions.description: Clinical graduation internship of the Technical Medicine program on the cardiology and cardiothoracic surgery departments, combined with research on the unraveling of the electropathophysiology of atrial fibrillation in patients undergoing mitral valve surgery.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Intern

company.name: Nederlandse Vereniging voor Technische Geneeskunde - NVvTG

profile_positions.company: NVvTG - Nederlandse Vereniging voor Technische Geneeskunde
profile_positions.title: Treasurer TiiM Conference

profile_positions.description:
- Culture & Events (projects a.o. Batavierenfeest and Kick-In)
- Courses of the Technical Medicine program (anatomy and imaging techniques, dissection room anatomy (Radboudumc), cardiovascular system, signal acquisition and processing, regulation & integration of systems, signal analysis, digestive system and project and bachelor assignment tutor)
- Promotional team Technical Medicine program
- Assistent teacher Bonhoeffer College Enschede (science orientation via Twente Academy)
profile_positions.title: Student assistant

profile_positions.description: Clinical internship of the Technical Medicine program on the cardiothoracic surgery and cardiology/anesthesiology departments, combined with research on perioperative pericardial flushing, and on the influence of the Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation (TAVI) on hemodynamics.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Intern

profile_positions.description: Clinical internship of the Technical Medicine program on the head and neck oncology and surgery department, combined with research on modeling of the lips' muscles using a mass-spring system.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Intern

profile_positions.description: Clinical internship of the Technical Medicine program on the pediatric intensive care unit, combined with research on the influence of noradrenalin on the mean systemic filling pressure in controlled resuscitated endotoxic shock.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Intern

profile_positions.description: Clinical internship of the Technical Medicine program on the intensive care unit, combined with research on the elastance of the middle cerebral artery after cardiac arrest.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Intern

volunteer_experiences.description: Medical steward bij wedstrijden van FC Twente of interlands gehouden in de Grolsch Veste.
